thread.title: A winner in Paris!
thread.title_full: A winner in Paris! - Review of Hotel Relais Bosquet Paris, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: KansasScout
title: A winner in Paris!
text: Spent four nights here and it was superb. The room was well appointed, with a large bathroom, good fixtures, good bed, adequate room to move around, plus coffee. Staff was very helpful calling taxis, answering questions. Well located in Rue Cler neighborhood. Nice breakfast buffet, more like an English buffet than the usual croissant and jam and coffee of some pensions. Our new favorite in Paris.
